abstract: The president’s picked-for-television defense team avoids a ratings “Death Valley,” then gets hit by a Bolton from the blue.
lead_paragraph: President Trump, reportedly, wanted a telegenic team to make the case for him at his impeachment trial. But the biggest star in the Senate chamber on the first full day of his defense on Monday was The Man Who Wasn’t There.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
